name: Feed Fred (GMTK Game Jam 2020)
description:
This Game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme is 'Out of Control' and I used this theme to take away the control of the speed that Fred travels, making the game unpredictable. The main objective of the game is to feed Fred the burgers to increase your score.  Try  to stay alive for as along  as you can and feed Fred as many burgers as you can.

Discord: https://discord.gg/mwZNMCf

 please can you leave a comment of what you think
